price: 77. Bango banso bazali banguna na ngai, longola sé Nkolo wa molongo.
arabic: فَإِنَّهُمۡ عَدُوّٞ لِّيٓ إِلَّا رَبَّ ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: fa-innahum ʿaduwwun lī illā rabba al-ʿālamīna
